article:
(top row, far right).]] This 'list of Georgia Institute of Technology
 alumni' includes graduates, non-graduate former students, and current students
 of Georgia Tech. Notable administration, faculty, and staff are found on the
 list of Georgia Institute of Technology faculty. Georgia Tech alumni are
 generally known as 'Yellow Jackets'. According to the Georgia Tech Alumni
 Association,


The first class of 128 students entered Georgia Tech in 1888, and the first two
graduates, Henry L. Smith and George G. Crawford, received their degrees in
1890. Smith would later lead a manufacturing enterprise in Dalton, Georgia and
Crawford would head Birmingham, Alabama's large Tennessee Coal, Iron, and
Railway Company. Since then, the Institute has greatly
expanded, with an enrollment of 12,769 undergraduates and 6,464 postgraduate
students .
